channel.title: people on The Rules
channel.description: Recent content in people on The Rules

item.title: #16 - Empty Carriage
item.description: Here is an illustration for you to fuel up your associations. Life is akin to a railroad we are moving along towing the carriages as if we were a locomotive. The carriages represent the people, the items, and the objects we value and love in our life. We, the engine attached to the front of the train, shoulder all the weight and responsibilities. When we start feeling that some of the carriages are empty, it only adds up weight with no significant benefit to us.

item.title: #10 - Greed
item.description: Tell me, what is that? Some sort of greed to fill up your coffee mug full up to the rim? Like that: And then, with a peculiar gait, trying not to spill it, carry it to a dining table. I just looked through my window and didn’t see a war, or a burst of hunger there, which would cause us to fight for every single ounce and milliliter of boiling water for our drinks.
